item.title: Hello World
item.description: The birth of a (umm…) Hi. So lets see how this goes. Not sure how often I’ll be able to update this but it’s something I’ve always wanted to try and do. I’ll probably just be updating it with stuff that I find interesting, come across or just put stuff up that’s on my mind. Hey, there’s always a first time right. So, see ya soon. -Rochan

item.title: About Me
item.description: Fun fact, most people can’t pronounce my first name. It’s roh-chan, not raw-chan or roh-shan. I’m a 19 year old, love reading about various (sometimes random) topics, knew what I wanted to do at the age of 13 and play almost every sport. I spent the first 17 years of my life in Bangalore, India. It’s only recently that I spend majority of the year in Hyderabad, India where I pursue undergraduate Computer Science at Mahindra Ecole Centrale.
